text: Svante Thuresson (7 February 1937 â€“ 10 May 2021) was a Swedish jazz drummer and singer. He started his career as a drummer before joining the band Gals and Pals in 1963. Svante represented Sweden in the 1966 Eurovision Song Contest with "Nygammal vals". He died on 10 May 2021, at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish drummers Category:Jazz singers Category:Singers from Stockholm Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Svante Thuresson
